title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin analyzes Jordan Love's first NFL start and why the Packers should be a little concerned about their future franchise QB. He praises Baker Mayfield for the Browns dominating win over the Bengals and how this proves Cleveland is better without Odell Beckham Jr. He tells you why he was right about Aaron Rodgers and wrong about Kyle Shanahan. Plus, Bengals QB Joe Burrow joins the show to discuss the difference between being a rookie QB and a second year play caller. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
